author: Staff Reporter
text:
A nursing student of the Government Stanley Hospital committed suicide at her hostel on Monday.

City police sources said Amudha, a second-year nursing student, had returned from her native village in Kallkurichi. As she did not attend classes, her friends visited her quarters, where they found her hanging from the ceiling. Seven Wells Police are investigating. Sneha’s suicide prevention helpline can be reached at 24640050.
title: Nursing student commits suicide
